committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety

official_title: To amend the Federal employee compensation provisions of title 5, United States Code, to provide benefits for a disability involving the large intestine.

summary.text: Amends Federal civil service law to provide for compensation payments for Federal employees who are disabled as a result of work related injuries causing permanent loss, or loss of use, of the large intestine.

titles.title: To amend the Federal employee compensation provisions of title 5, United States Code, to provide benefits for a disability involving the large intestine.
